00025 // Linux-specific declarations
00026 #if PLATFORM(Linux)
00027 
00028 /// Return type of the main function of a thread.
00029 typedef void* THREAD_RESULT;
00030 
00031 /// Calling convention for the main function of a thread.
00032 #define __THREAD__ /* nothing! */
00033 
00034 /// Type of the main function of a thread main.
00035 typedef THREAD_RESULT ( __THREAD__ *ThreadFunc)(void*);
00036 #define threadfunc THREAD_RESULT  __THREAD__
00037 
00038 /// Identification of the current thread.
00039 #define currentThreadID pthread_self()
00040 
00041 #define currentProcessID()  ((uint)getpid())
00042 
00043 #endif // PLATFORM(Linux)
00044 
00045 // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 
00047 // Windows-specific declarations
00048 #if PLATFORM(Windows)
00049 
00050 // *** when using CreateThread
00051 // *** /// Return type of the main function of a thread.
00052 // *** typedef DWORD THREAD_RESULT;
00053 
00054 // when using _beginthreadex
00055 /// Return type of the main function of a thread.
00056 typedef unsigned THREAD_RESULT;
00057 
00058 // *** when using CreateThread
00059 // *** /// Calling convention for the main function of a thread.
00060 // *** #define __THREAD__ WINAPI
00061 
00062 // when using _beginthreadex (in fact, WINAPI and __stdcall are identical!)
00063 /// Calling convention for the main function of a thread.
00064 #define __THREAD__ __stdcall
00065 
00066 /// Type of the main function of a thread.
00067 typedef THREAD_RESULT ( __THREAD__ *ThreadFunc)(void*);
00068 #define threadfunc THREAD_RESULT  __THREAD__
00069 
00070 /// Identification of the current thread.
00071 #define currentThreadID GetCurrentThreadId()
00072 
00073 #define currentProcessID()  ((uint)GetCurrentProcessId())
00074 
00075 #endif // PLATFORM(Windows)

00094
